com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Class SCUISecureTokenGeneratorHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers.SCUISecureTokenGeneratorHelper

  • public class SCUISecureTokenGeneratorHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is helper class to generate secure tokens. This class contains map of secure token generators for each application. ISCUISecureTokenGenerator asmisrha

      static java.lang.String generateSecureToken(SCUIContext uiContext)

      static ISCUISecureTokenGenerator getTokenGenerator(SCUIContext uiContext)
      Getter of the ISCUISecureTokenGenerator for a given SCUIContext; returns null if it does not exits.

      Getter of the static ISCUISecureTokenGenerator for a given SCUIContext; returns null if it does not exits.

      This method loads secure token generator using web.xml context parameter.

        public static ISCUISecureTokenGenerator getTokenGenerator(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)

      • loadTokenGenerator

        public static ISCUISecureTokenGenerator loadTokenGenerator(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method loads secure token generator using web.xml context parameter. It allows ISCUISecureTokenGenerator to be set only once for an application. uiContext of the type SCUIContext ISCUISecureTokenGenerator

      • loadTokenGenerator

        public static ISCUISecureTokenGenerator loadTokenGenerator(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        This method loads secure token generator using web.xml context parameter. This method should be used while initializing generator using a init servlet where SCUIContext is not available. It allows ISCUISecureTokenGenerator to be set only once for an application. servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext ISCUISecureTokenGenerator

      • setTokenGenerator

        public static void setTokenGenerator(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                     ISCUISecureTokenGenerator tokenGenerator)
        This method sets given secure token generator for current application. It allows ISCUISecureTokenGenerator to be set only once for an application. uiContext of the type SCUIContext tokenGenerator of type ISCUISecureTokenGenerator

      • setTokenGenerator

        public static void setTokenGenerator(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                                     ISCUISecureTokenGenerator tokenGenerator)
        This method sets given secure token generator for current application. This method should be used while initializing genearator from a init servlet where SCUIContext is not available. It allows ISCUISecureTokenGenerator to be set only once for an application. servletContext of the type javax.servlet.ServletContext tokenGenerator of the type ISCUISecureTokenGenerator
